text: avarellaru allahaneduru hajaraguvaru. (Aga) doddastike toruttiddavarodane durbalaru, ‘‘navu nimage adhinaragiddevu. Niviga nam'ma melinda allahana sikseyannu svalpavadaru nivarisaballira?’’ Endu keluvaru. Avaru heluvaru; onduvele allahanu namage sari dariyannu toriddare navu nimage sari dari torisuttiddevu. Iga navu rodisidaru onde, sahisikondaru onde. Namage ulivantu illa
